Posts.Content:
I am new to your forum. I was so happy to find this and I have read all the post. It's good to know I am not alone. Feels like it a lot of the time. I had breast cancer stage 0, Never heard of such a thing? Had a the cancer removed last July and then 6 weeks of radiation. I have been on tamoxifen for about
 5 months, my side effects have been night leg cramps, some weight gain, hot flashes.All of these not so bad. but latly the tierdness and upset stomach is getting me down. I don't have the get up and go like I used to. Trying to keep a positive attitude and know it is all worth it to stop the cancer from coming back , but hell what's a girl to do? 4 and a half more years of this...
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen Side Effects
